name: proposal-builder
description: Internal proposal builder with PDF generation

scripts.postinstall: node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const path = require('path'); const onRender = !!process.env.RENDER; const cacheDir = process.env.PUPPETEER_CACHE_DIR || path.join(process.cwd(), '.cache', 'puppeteer'); if (!process.env.PUPPETEER_CACHE_DIR) process.env.PUPPETEER_CACHE_DIR = cacheDir; console.log('[postinstall] onRender=', onRender, 'PUPPETEER_CACHE_DIR=', process.env.PUPPETEER_CACHE_DIR); if (onRender) { execSync('npx --yes puppeteer browsers install chrome', { stdio: 'inherit', env: process.env }); } else { console.log('[postinstall] skipping chrome download locally'); }"
